recipe.title: Grandmas Bread and Butter Pud
recipe.comment: Great for any leftover stale bread- I usually use raisin toast, this photo was taken using fruit scones.
recipe.step: Grease a pan with butter or margarine and set aside.
Butter both cut sides of scones and one side with jam.
Put together like a sandwich and cut into quarters and place in pan until all scones used up.
In a bowl beat eggs with milk, sugar and essence.
Pour milk mixture over bread and place in oven for 20-30 minutes.
There should be no wet bits when done.
Cover with foil if getting too brown while cooking.
Serve alone or with cream and/or ice cream.
if using bread (not fruit scones) butter and jam each slice and place one piece on top of the other, like you are making a sandwich.
Cut each sandwich into 16ths, and place in pan.
If using plain bread I would definitely throw in a handful of sultanas!.
